import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{liveStatuses,completedMatchStatuses,upcomingMatchStatuses,otherMatchStatuses}from'./../../constants/matchStatusConstants';import{useSchedule}from'./../../context/ScheduleContext';import MatchCard from'./../MatchCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeaturedMatches=()=>{const{matches,loading}=useSchedule();const[featuredMatches,setFeaturedMatches]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMatches=async()=>{try{if(loading||!Array.isArray(matches))return;const liveMatches=matches.filter(m=>liveStatuses.includes(m.status));const upcomingMatches=matches.filter(m=>upcomingMatchStatuses.includes(m.status));const completedMatches=matches.filter(m=>completedMatchStatuses.includes(m.status));const featured=[];// Add up to 2 live matches first
featured.push(...liveMatches.slice(0,2));// Track how many more we need to make 3
let remaining=3-featured.length;// Add 1 upcoming match if available and needed
if(remaining>0&&upcomingMatches.length>0){featured.push(upcomingMatches[0]);remaining--;}// Add completed match if still needed
if(remaining>0&&completedMatches.length>0){featured.push(completedMatches[0]);remaining--;}// Gather remaining matches in extras
const extras=[...liveMatches.slice(2),...upcomingMatches.slice(1),...completedMatches.slice(1)];// If still not 3 featured matches (in extreme edge cases), fill from extras
while(featured.length<3&&extras.length>0){featured.push(extras.shift());}setFeaturedMatches(featured);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching featured matches:',err);}};fetchMatches();},[matches,loading]);if(!featuredMatches)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading featured matches...."});if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading featured matches..."});if(!featuredMatches.length)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No matches found."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"live-matches-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83C\uDFCF Top Matches"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/schedule",children:"View All"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"match-cards-row",children:featuredMatches.map(match=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MatchCard,{match:match},match.id))})]});};export default FeaturedMatches;
